content:
hmm. I'm having trouble with this expression on ImplementationGuide.definition:

resource.package.all(package.id.contains($this))

(If a resource as a package, it must refer to a package defined in the Implementation Guide)
the trouble is that $this refers to the inner iterator, not the outer iterator, which is the one I want to refer to. is there a better way to express this?

In the spec, it looks like "contains" for membership is an operator, and contains() as a function is for strings. That being the case, I would guess the expression would be written like:

resource.package.all(package.id contains $this)

In that case, is there an inner iterator?
sweet. I forgot to think about the operator variant
